items.sentence: Here\'s a list of things that I want to do.
Tom is old enough to know right from wrong.
Tom is one of the richest men in the world.
We\'re doing everything we can to find Tom.
We\'ve got something we need to talk about.
The picture brought back a lot of memories.
The soldiers filled the sandbags with sand.
The teacher pokes his nose into everything.
Both of my parents don\'t know how to swim.
You really don\'t know who that is, do you?
You really should\'ve told Tom not to come.
I\'m not going to say anything against Tom.
I\'m not going to teach you how to do that.
I\'m not sure that it was Tom who did that.
I\'m interested in learning how to do that.
I\'m looking for someone who speaks French.
Tom and I swim together three times a week.
Tom and John were both kicked off the team.
Tom and Mary are both young and attractive.
Tom and Mary are disappointed in their son.
Tom and Mary are flying to Boston tomorrow.
I assume you\'ll not come to work tomorrow.
I assume you\'ll want to stay here with us.
I\'ve learned a lot of techniques from Tom.
I\'ve lived here for more than three years.
I\'ve made that same mistake several times.
I\'ve never been able to beat Tom at chess.
I\'ve never been so embarrassed in my life.
I\'ve never done anything like this before.
Tom has just returned from the post office.
Tom has no choice but to do what Mary asks.
Tom has spent much of his life behind bars.
I can\'t imagine what you\'ve gone through.
They might not notice that Tom isn\'t here.
They\'re willing to talk about the problem.
Tom just wants you to take care of his dog.
Tom lifted the lid and looked into the pot.
Tom looks even more nervous than Mary does.
Tom looks like a deer caught in headlights.
Your problems are nothing compared to mine.
Your windshield wipers need to be replaced.
Now that you\'re my girlfriend, I\'m happy.
Let\'s get together again tomorrow evening.
Let\'s go and see as many things as we can.
Let\'s open a window to get some fresh air.
Mary didn\'t tell me Tom was her boyfriend.
They rented the upstairs room to a student.
This may be our only chance to talk to Tom.
We had no idea what we were supposed to do.
What are the exact dimensions of this room?
I\'m sorry I can\'t tell you more about it.
Was that you I heard singing in the shower?
I think Tom doesn\'t like me all that much.
I don\'t know how long the party will last.
I don\'t know if you feel the same as I do.
I don\'t know the reason why he went there.
I don\'t know the traffic regulations here.
I didn\'t know you could cook so well, Tom.
I didn\'t know you were coming here either.
I didn\'t notice her going out of the room.
Why is this website taking so long to load?
Would you like me to open the door for you?
Maybe I shouldn\'t invite Tom to the party.
Maybe Tom couldn\'t afford to buy a ticket.
Maybe Tom saw something he shouldn\'t have.
I\'ll be surprised if Tom doesn\'t do that.
My most interesting Canadian friend is Tom.
My mother was the one who taught me French.
My parents would never allow me to do that.
I almost always play baseball after school.
I always add a spoonful of honey to my tea.
I always have fun when I hang out with Tom.
I always start my day with a cup of coffee.
I always stay with Tom when I visit Boston.
My father told me not to read books in bed.
My grandfather passed away three years ago.
Aren\'t you still living with your parents?
I might be able to fit that in my schedule.
I nearly spilled my coffee on the keyboard.
I need a ladder so I can get up to my roof.
Tom usually eats breakfast with his family.
Tom usually works from nine to five-thirty.
Tom walked a few steps, and then collapsed.
Tom walked into the room, carrying flowers.
Tom has been in Australia for three months.
Tom has been injured three times this year.
Tom has been subpoenaed to appear in court.
Tom has never said a word to me about that.
The children threw snowballs at each other.
I never dreamed that I would meet you here.
It was Tom that broke the window yesterday.
I just want to keep things nice and simple.
I can\'t believe we\'re really living here.
Are you sure you can handle it by yourself?
Be careful what you say and how you say it.
There is an urgent need for drinking water.
There is no telling what time he will come.
There used to be big trees around the pond.
Tom advised me not to buy a secondhand car.
Tom and Mary have a very good relationship.
